title: The Pirate of the Black Hawk

sources.title: The Pirate of the Black Hawk (1958) Adventure | Full Movie
sources.description:
SO VAST IT SWEEPS ALL BEFORE IT!
In the 16th century, Captain Riccardo, the leader of a pirate band on the ship Black Hawk, face off against Manfred an evil tryant who has usurped the throne with his band of pirates. This powerful villain also kidnaps Elena, the daughter of the Duke, for marriage.  But the famed Captain comes to her rescue.

Original title: Il pirata dello sparviero nero
Director: Sergio Grieco
Writers: Sergio Grieco, Enzo Alfonsi, Mario Caiano
Stars: Gérard Landry, Pina Bottin, Andrea Aureli
Genre: Adventure

metadata.Plot: Manfred, backed by Saracen pirates, deposes the Duke of Montfort, takes over the throne and kidnapped the Duke's young son. Capt. Riccardo, the leader of a pirate band on the ship Black Hawk, sets out to defeat Manfred and his Saracens and restore the Duke to his rightful place on the throne.
metadata.Writer: Sergio Grieco, Enzo Alfonsi, Mario Caiano
metadata.Actors: Gérard Landry, Pina Bottin, Andrea Aureli
